name: Tripopolis - Another Impossible Arcade Game
description:
Tripopolis is a very fast paced arcade game, if you thought Flappy Bird, The Impossible Game, Hundreds and Lumberjack was hard, think again.

You get multiplier points if you don't lift your finger from the screen, but be aware the speed can get insanely fast.

Coordination and fast reflexes is a must in this game. Hope you will enjoy the challenge. Don't be afraid to share and get your friends playing it too.
